title: Frontier Stories

renewed-contributions.title: Firebrand
renewed-contributions.note: A 1969 CCE renewal record puts this story in the Winter 1941 issue of Frontier Stories, but FictionMags and the Winter 1940 issue cover instead put it in the Winter 1940 issue.  A 1969 renewal may be too late to cover stories in that issue

renewed-contributions.title: Firebrand
renewed-contributions.note: A 1969 CCE renewal record puts this story in the Winter 1941 issue of Frontier Stories, but FictionMags and the Winter 1940 issue cover instead put it in the Winter 1940 issue.  A 1969 renewal may be too late to cover stories in that issue

renewed-contributions.title: Bowie, Famous Blade of the Alamo

additional-note: The magazine was titled 'The Frontier' up to the November 1926 issue, and 'Frontier Stories' thereafter.   Some issues late in the run add 'of Pioneer Days' to the cover title in smaller lettering.
